overview: Sex and Humor run rampant as Steve (a B-Movie director) steals a script and films it as his "breakthrough" movie. Throw in a Russian Mobster Financier who insists on more T&A an "over the top" lesbian shower scene and an oversexed All-Star cast and you have the makings of a XXX Masterpiece
tagline: The perfect script just fell in his lap...
title: The Masterpiece
